reviewText: This movie was not exactly what I expected in a "Christian Movie".  I was surprised with the good acting and extremely good plot.  Everything was natural and realistic.The quality of the filming was equally good.  Nothing at all in the amateur way.This movie is NOT your typical "goodie-two-shoes" Christian movie.  The whole movie was a surprise...not only the ending.I whole-heartedly encourage everyone to watch this flick!  It is a winner in my book!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: While this is not on par with a Bogie and Bacall movie.  I wasn't expecting that either.  However, what I got was a good movie that had a clear message of redemption, forgiveness, and, in the end, sacrifice.  Yes, the ending was sad, but, in my opinion, quite powerful.  From where the father of the man who extended forgiveness to Joe Rowley's character all the way to when Joe's character was killed by the vindictive, angry young man.The short of it is that I liked this movie.  A lot.  Don't expect Bogie and Bacall.  Don't expect anything of the Hollywood ilk.  Just expect a movie with a message.  That there is hope and forgiveness.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This a great movie about people trying to leave and overcome their past.  As they face new challenges, they are pushed to find the true source of their reason for living.  There is some good drama and suspense in this movie.  The actors do a superb job.  The ending has an unexpected twist.  Watch it or buy ... it will be enjoyed.
